verses.verse: (For the choir director; upon Aijeleth Hashshahar. A Psalm of David.) My God, <WH410> my God, <WH410> why <WH4100> hast Thou forsaken <WH5800> me? Far <WH7350> from my deliverance <WH3444> are the words <WH1697> of my groaning. <WH7581>
O my God, <WH430> I cry <WH7121> by day, <WH3119> but Thou dost not answer; <WH6030> And by night, <WH3915> but I have no <WH3808> rest. <WH1747>
Yet Thou art holy, <WH6918> O Thou who art enthroned <WH3427> upon the praises <WH8416> of Israel. <WH3478>
In Thee our fathers trusted; <WH1> They trusted, <WH982> and Thou didst deliver <WH982> them.
To Thee they cried <WH2199> out, and were delivered; <WH4422> In Thee they trusted, <WH982> and were not disappointed. <WH954>
But I am a worm, <WH9641> and not a man, <WH376> A reproach <WH2781> of men, <WH120> and despised <WH959> by the people. <WH5971>
All <WH3605> who see <WH7200> me sneer <WH3932> at me; They separate <WH6362> with the lip, <WH8193> they wag <WH5128> the head, <WH7218> [saying,]
"Commit <WH1556> [yourself] to the Lord; <WH3068> let Him deliver <WH6403> him; Let Him rescue <WH5337> him, because <WH3588> He delights <WH2654> in him."
Yet <WH3588> Thou art He who didst bring <WH1518> me forth <WH1518> from the womb; <WH990> Thou didst make me trust <WH982> [when] upon my mother's breasts. <WH7699>
Upon Thee I was cast <WH7993> from birth; <WH7358> Thou hast been my God <WH410> from my mother's womb. <WH990>
Be not far <WH7368> from me, for trouble <WH6869> is near; <WH7138> For there <WH369> is none <WH369> to help. <WH5826>
Many <WH7227> bulls <WH6499> have surrounded <WH5437> me; Strong <WH47> [bulls] of Bashan <WH1316> have encircled <WH3803> me.
They open <WH6475> wide <WH6475> their mouth <WH6310> at me, As a ravening <WH2963> and a roaring <WH7580> lion. <WH9030>
I am poured <WH8210> out like water, <WH4325> And all <WH3605> my bones <WH6106> are out of joint; <WH6504> My heart <WH3820> is like wax; <WH1749> It is melted <WH4549> within <WH8432> me.
My strength <WH3581> is dried <WH3001> up like a potsherd, <WH2789> And my tongue <WH3956> cleaves <WH1692> to my jaws; <WH9270> And Thou dost lay <WH8239> me in the dust <WH6083> of death. <WH4194>
For dogs <WH3611> have surrounded <WH5437> me; A band <WH5712> of evildoers <WH7489> has encompassed <WH5362> me; They pierced <WH9206> my hands <WH3027> and my feet. <WH7272>
I can count <WH5608> all <WH3605> my bones. <WH6106> They look, <WH5027> they stare <WH7200> at me;
They divide <WH2505> my garments <WH899> among them, And for my clothing <WH3830> they cast <WH5307> lots. <WH1486>
But Thou, O Lord, <WH3068> be not far <WH7368> off; O Thou my help, <WH360> hasten <WH2363> to my assistance. <WH5833>
Deliver <WH5337> my soul <WH5315> from the sword, <WH2719> My only <WH3173> [life] from the power <WH3027> of the dog. <WH3611>
Save <WH3467> me from the lion's mouth; <WH6310> And from the horns <WH7161> of the wild <WH7214> oxen <WH7214> Thou dost answer <WH6030> me.
I will tell <WH5608> of Thy name <WH8034> to my brethren; <WH251> In the midst <WH8432> of the assembly <WH6951> I will praise <WH1984> Thee.

You who fear <WH3372> the Lord, <WH3068> praise <WH1984> Him; All <WH3605> you descendants <WH2233> of Jacob, <WH3290> glorify <WH3513> Him, And stand <WH9076> in awe <WH9076> of Him, all <WH3605> you descendants <WH2233> of Israel. <WH3478>

For He has not despised <WH959> nor <WH3808> abhorred <WH8262> the affliction <WH6039> of the afflicted; <WH6041> Neither <WH3808> has He hidden <WH5641> His face <WH6440> from him; But when he cried <WH7768> to Him for help, <WH7768> He heard. <WH8085>
From Thee [comes] my praise <WH8416> in the great <WH7227> assembly; <WH6951> I shall pay <WH9608> my vows <WH5088> before <WH5048> those who fear <WH3372> Him.
The afflicted <WH6035> shall eat <WH398> and be satisfied; <WH7646> Those who seek <WH1875> Him will praise <WH1984> the Lord. <WH3068> Let your heart <WH3824> live <WH2421> forever! <WH5703>

All <WH3605> the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776> will remember <WH2142> and turn <WH7725> to the Lord, <WH3068> And all <WH3605> the families <WH4940> of the nations <WH1471> will worship <WH7812> before <WH6440> Thee.
For the kingdom <WH4410> is the Lord's, And He rules <WH4910> over the nations. <WH1471>

All <WH3605> the prosperous <WH1879> of the earth <WH776> will eat <WH398> and worship, <WH7812> All <WH3605> those who go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the dust <WH6083> will bow <WH3766> before <WH6440> Him, Even he who cannot <WH3808> keep <WH2421> his soul <WH5315> alive. <WH2421>
Posterity <WH2233> will serve <WH5647> Him; It will be told <WH5608> of the Lord <WH136> to the [coming] generation. <WH1755>
They will come <WH935> and will declare <WH5046> His righteousness <WH6666> To a people <WH5971> who will be born, <WH3205> that He has performed <WH6213> [it.]
